AuthMode.description:
Authentication mode for OpenAI-backed providers.

This is used internally to determine the base URL for generating responses, and to gate ChatGPT-only behaviors like rate limits and available models (as opposed to API key-based auth).

oneOf.description: OpenAI API key provided by the caller and stored by Codex.
ChatGPT OAuth managed by Codex (tokens persisted and refreshed by Codex).
